name: Pumpkins From The Dead
description:
A lonely pumpkin remembers and longs for the time when Halloween was a time of true fright, rather than the cutesy holiday that we usually think of. Interested in pumpkin's longing thoughts, the grim reaper saves pumpkin from being killed in the hands of a human child, and gives him the ability to go on a rampage on the entire city, with bloody, sharp teeth. What could possibly go wrong in this scenario?

Controls

Q -> dash

WASD - jump, left, right, and down respectively

(This is my first ever playable game without using a tutorial, my first game jam submission, and my first ever Itch.io upload. You should expect to see tons of bugs, and you really should not expect much. With this in mind, hope you enjoy!

made for Spooktober Jam 2021

(only works on PC, unfortunately.)
